movies.title: The Sting
movies.Plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

movies.title: Timecop
movies.Plot: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

movies.title: Dante's Peak
movies.Plot: A volcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second-most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that a nearby long-dormant volcano may awaken at any moment.

movies.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
movies.Plot: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

movies.title: Godzilla
movies.Plot: French nuclear tests irradiate an iguana into a giant monster that heads off to New York City. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces.

movies.title: Dil Se
movies.Plot: A radio broadcaster's intense attraction to a mysterious woman opens the door to a tidal wave of powerful emotions and desires.

movies.title: Darr
movies.Plot: Rahul is obsessed with Kiran and stalks her constantly. However, Rahul goes berserk when she gets engaged to Sunil, a navy officer, and he decides to forcefully claim Kiran for himself.

movies.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
movies.Plot: In late 1950s New York, a young underachiever named Tom Ripley is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

movies.title: Hollow Man
movies.Plot: A brilliant scientist's discovery renders him invisible, but transforms him into an omnipotent, dangerous megalomaniac.

movies.title: What Lies Beneath
movies.Plot: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

movies.title: Don't Say a Word
movies.Plot: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...

movies.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
movies.Plot: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

movies.title: Man on Fire
movies.Plot: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

movies.title: Johnny Mnemonic
movies.Plot: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

movies.title: Christine
movies.Plot: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

movies.title: The Illusionist
movies.Plot: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

movies.title: Zodiac
movies.Plot: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

movies.title: The Hurt Locker
movies.Plot: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

movies.title: New York
movies.Plot: A contemporary story of 3 friends discovering a new world set against the larger than life New York City. But one day the world around them changed.

movies.title: Cell 211
movies.Plot: The story of two men on different sides of a prison riot -- the inmate leading the rebellion and the young guard trapped in the revolt, who poses as a prisoner in a desperate attempt to survive the ordeal.

movies.title: Silenced
movies.Plot: Based on real events, this film depicts the story of a school for the hearing-impaired where young deaf students were sexually assaulted by the faculty members over a long period of time.

movies.title: The Iceman
movies.Plot: The story of Richard Kuklinski, the notorious contract killer and family man. When he was finally arrested in 1986, neither his wife nor his daughters had any clue about his real profession.

movies.title: The Paperboy
movies.Plot: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

movies.title: Stolen
movies.Plot: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

movies.title: Lone Survivor
movies.Plot: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

movies.title: The Call
movies.Plot: When a veteran 911 operator takes a life-altering call from a teenage girl who has just been abducted, she realizes that she must confront a killer from her past in order to save the girl's life.

movies.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
movies.Plot: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

movies.title: Ouija
movies.Plot: Terror awaits five friends who unwittingly awaken a dark power by using an antique Ouija board.

movies.title: Creep
movies.Plot: A young videographer answers an online ad for a one-day job in a remote town to record the last messages of a dying man. When he notices the man's odd behavior, he starts to question his intentions.

movies.title: Before I Wake
movies.Plot: A couple adopt an orphaned child whose dreams - and nightmares - manifest physically as he sleeps.

movies.title: No Good Deed
movies.Plot: An unstable escaped convict terrorizes a woman who is alone with her two children.

movies.title: Dark Places
movies.Plot: Libby Day was only eight years old when her family was brutally murdered in their rural Kansas farmhouse. Almost thirty years later, she reluctantly agrees to revisit the crime and uncovers the wrenching truths that led up to that...

movies.title: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!
movies.Plot: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy is set in the 2nd World War torn Calcutta during the 1940s. Enter a magical world of nostalgia and 'Expect the Unexpected'.

movies.title: Survivor
movies.Plot: A Foreign Service Officer in London tries to prevent a terrorist attack set to hit New York City, but is forced to go on the run when she is framed for crimes she did not commit.

movies.title: Green Room
movies.Plot: A punk rock band is forced to fight for survival after witnessing a murder at a neo-Nazi skinhead bar.

movies.title: Under the Shadow
movies.Plot: As a mother and daughter struggle to cope with the terrors of the post-revolution, war-torn Tehran of the 1980s, a mysterious evil begins to haunt their home.

movies.title: Spectral
movies.Plot: A sci-fi/thriller story centered on a special-ops team that is dispatched to fight supernatural beings.

movies.title: The Infiltrator
movies.Plot: A U.S. Customs official uncovers a money laundering scheme involving Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

movies.title: Wheelman
movies.Plot: A getaway driver for a bank robbery realizes he has been double crossed and races to find out who betrayed him.

movies.title: Train to Busan
movies.Plot: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

movies.title: Bon Cop Bad Cop 2
movies.Plot: A francophone S.Q. officer and an anglophone O.P.P officer reunite to investigate a large car theft ring led by an Italian mobster.

movies.title: The Cloverfield Paradox
movies.Plot: Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

movies.title: Hold the Dark
movies.Plot: After the deaths of three children suspected to be killed by wolves, writer Russell Core is hired by the mother of a missing six-year-old boy to track down and locate her son in the Alaskan wilderness.

movies.title: Apostle
movies.Plot: In 1905, a drifter on a dangerous mission to rescue his kidnapped sister tangles with a sinister religious cult on an isolated island.

movies.title: The Babysitter
movies.Plot: When Cole stays up past his bedtime, he discovers that his babysitter belongs to an evil cult that will stop at nothing to keep him quiet.

movies.title: Icarus
movies.Plot: When Bryan sets out to uncover the truth about doping in sports, a chance meeting with a Russian scientist transforms his story from a personal experiment into a geopolitical thriller.

movies.title: Creep 2
movies.Plot: A video artist looking for work drives to a remote house in the forest to meet a man claiming to be a serial killer. But after agreeing to spend the day with him, she soon realizes that she made a deadly mistake.

movies.title: Only the Brave
movies.Plot: Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.

movies.title: The Foreigner
movies.Plot: A humble businessman with a buried past seeks justice when his daughter is killed in an act of terrorism. A cat-and-mouse conflict ensues with a government official, whose past may hold clues to the killers' identities.

movies.title: The Angel
movies.Plot: As his country prepares for war, top Egyptian official Ashraf Marwan makes contact with Israel and wades into a shadowy game of high-stakes espionage.

movies.title: The Photographer Of Mauthausen
movies.Plot: Based on real events, Francesc Boix is a Spaniard inmate in the Nazi concentration camp of Mauthausen in Austria who tries to save the evidences of the horrors committed inside its walls.

movies.title: Triple Frontier
movies.Plot: Loyalties are tested when five friends and former special forces operatives reunite to take down a South American drug lord, unleashing a chain of unintended consequences.

movies.title: Bird Box
movies.Plot: Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a mother and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.

movies.title: Blood Red Sky
movies.Plot: A woman with a mysterious illness is forced into action when a group of terrorists attempt to hijack a transatlantic overnight flight.

movies.title: The Open House
movies.Plot: A teenager and his mother find themselves besieged by threatening forces when they move into a new house.

movies.title: The Last Days of American Crime
movies.Plot: In the not-too-distant future, as a final response to terrorism and crime, the U.S. government plans to broadcast a signal making it impossible for anyone to knowingly commit unlawful acts.

movies.title: The Highwaymen
movies.Plot: The untold true story of the legendary detectives who brought down Bonnie and Clyde.

movies.title: Intrusion
movies.Plot: A woman moves to a small town with her husband, but is rattled when she is targeted for a home invasion.

movies.title: THE WOLF HOUR
movies.Plot: An unseen tormentor harasses a reclusive author as a citywide blackout triggers fires, looting and escalating violence during the Summer of Sam in New York in 1977.

movies.title: Valley of the Dead
movies.Plot: Months after bloody combat leaves behind thousands of dead in the trenches, Jan Lozano, Captain of the Fifth Brigade, has fallen prisoner to an opponent's platoon, along with a young driver, while carrying out a mission that has b...

movies.title: The Mother
movies.Plot: While fleeing from dangerous assailants, an assassin comes out of hiding to protect the daughter she left earlier in life.

movies.title: See You Yesterday
movies.Plot: Two Brooklyn teenage prodigies, C.J. Walker and Sebastian Thomas, build makeshift time machines to save C.J.'s brother, Calvin, from being wrongfully killed by a police officer.

movies.title: Fractured
movies.Plot: A couple stops at a gas station, where their 6 y.o. daughter's arm is fractured. They hurry to a hospital. Something strange is going on there. The wife and daughter go missing.

movies.title: I Am Mother
movies.Plot: In the wake of humanity's extinction, a teenage girl is raised by a robot designed to repopulate the earth. But their unique bond is threatened when an inexplicable stranger arrives with alarming news.

movies.title: In the Shadow of the Moon
movies.Plot: A Philadelphia police officer struggles with a lifelong obsession to track down a mysterious serial killer whose crimes defy explanation.

movies.title: Fever Dream
movies.Plot: It will tell the haunting story of broken souls, toxins, looming environmental and spiritual catastrophes, and the ties that bind a parent to a child.

movies.title: The Killer
movies.Plot: Solitary, cold, methodical and unencumbered by scruples or regrets, a killer waits in the shadows, watching for his next target. Yet, the longer he waits, the more he thinks he's losing his mind, if not his cool.

movies.title: Extinction
movies.Plot: A father has a recurring dream of losing his family. His nightmare turns into reality when the planet is invaded by a force bent on destruction. Fighting for their lives, he comes to realize an unknown strength to keep them safe f...

movies.title: In the Tall Grass
movies.Plot: After hearing a young boy's cry for help, a sister and brother venture into a vast field of tall grass in Oklahoma but soon discover there may be no way out...and that something evil lurks within.

movies.title: The Red Sea Diving Resort
movies.Plot: Israel's Mossad agents attempt to rescue Ethiopian Jewish refugees in Sudan in 1979.

movies.title: There's Someone Inside Your House
movies.Plot: The graduating class at Osborne High is being targeted by a masked assailant, intent on exposing the darkest secret of each victim, and only a group of misfit outsiders can stop the killings.

movies.title: Malevolent
movies.Plot: A team of scam artists get more than they bargained for when a job at a haunted country estate gets out of hand.

movies.title: The Resistance Banker
movies.Plot: In Nazi-occupied Amsterdam, banker brothers Walraven and Gijs van Hall face their greatest challenge yet when they decide to help fund the Dutch resistance.

movies.title: Perdida
movies.Plot: A policewoman, whose childhood friend disappeared in Patagonia years ago, starts a new search to find answers and soon finds her own life in danger.

movies.title: Bad Genius
movies.Plot: Lynn, a brilliant student, after helping her friends to get the grades they need, develops the idea of starting a much bigger exam-cheating business.

movies.title: Operation Finale
movies.Plot: A team of secret agents sets out to track down the Nazi officer who masterminded the Holocaust.

movies.title: Damsel
movies.Plot: A dutiful damsel agrees to marry a handsome prince, only to find the royal family has recruited her as a sacrifice to repay an ancient debt.

movies.title: Mirage
movies.Plot: Vera, a mother of one, interacts with the ghost of a child and saves his life. However, her actions cause a space-time continuum glitch, altering reality.

movies.title: No One Gets Out Alive
movies.Plot: After being forced to take a room in a boardinghouse, an immigrant in search of the American Dream finds herself in a nightmare she can't escape.

movies.title: The Son
movies.Plot: Adopted son Arman (18) has an unstable character and cannot find peace in the struggle for his identity. His parents and younger brother Dado (14), who was born after Arman's adoption, suffer due to his restlessness and the enormo...

movies.title: Beckett
movies.Plot: Following a tragic car accident in Greece, an American tourist finds himself at the center of a dangerous political conspiracy and on the run for his life.

movies.title: Eye For An Eye
movies.Plot: A drug dealer looking for rest. A nurse looking for revenge. A crossroads where no one is safe.

movies.title: Secret Obsession
movies.Plot: Recuperating from trauma, Jennifer remains in danger as she returns to a life she doesn't remember.

movies.title: Wasp Network
movies.Plot: The story of five Cuban political prisoners who had been imprisoned by the United States since the late 1990s on charges of espionage and murder.

movies.title: Rebecca
movies.Plot: A young newlywed arrives at her husband's imposing family estate on a windswept English coast and finds herself battling the shadow of his first wife, Rebecca, whose legacy lives on in the house long after her death.

movies.title: Becky
movies.Plot: A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives.

movies.title: Uglies
movies.Plot: A world in which a compulsory operation wipes out physical differences and makes everyone pretty.

movies.title: Nightbooks
movies.Plot: Alex, a boy obsessed with scary stories, is imprisoned by an evil young witch in her contemporary New York City apartment.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.Plot: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

movies.title: Harriet
movies.Plot: The extraordinary tale of Harriet Tubman's escape from slavery and transformation into one of America's greatest heroines, whose courage, ingenuity and tenacity freed hundreds of slaves and changed the course of history.

movies.title: The Babysitter: Killer Queen
movies.Plot: Two years after Cole survived a satanic blood cult, he's living another nightmare: high school. And the demons from his past? Still making his life hell.

movies.title: Honest Thief
movies.Plot: Wanting to lead an honest life, a notorious bank robber turns himself in, only to be double-crossed by two ruthless FBI agents.

movies.title: The Decline
movies.Plot: A fatal accident at a remote survivalist training camp sends participants into a panic - and sets the stage for a chilling showdown.

movies.title: Rattlesnake
movies.Plot: When a single mother accepts the help of a mysterious woman after her daughter is bitten by a rattlesnake, she finds herself making an unthinkable deal with the devil to repay the stranger.

movies.title: The Silence
movies.Plot: When the world is under attack from terrifying creatures who hunt their human prey by sound, 16-year old Ally Andrews (Kiernan Shipka), who lost her hearing at 13, and her family seek refuge in a remote haven.

movies.title: Red Dot
movies.Plot: When Nadja becomes pregnant, she and David make an attempt to rekindle their relationship by traveling to the north of Sweden for a hiking trip, but soon their romantic trip turns into a nightmare.

movies.title: Brazen
movies.Plot: When her sister is killed and her double life as a webcam performer is revealed, Grace ignores the warnings of a cool-headed detective and gets involved in the case.

movies.title: Secrets in the Hot Spring
movies.Plot: Three youngsters meet by accident at a mysterious hot springs hotel. There, they fall into an unforgettable adventure. It starts off scary but soon turns funny when they have to try and save a family.

movies.title: Intuition
movies.Plot: Pipa begins her career as a police detective alongside her mentor, the controversial detective Francisco Ju√°nez. Together they must solve the violent murder of a 19-year-old girl.

movies.title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
movies.Plot: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.

movies.title: Below Zero
movies.Plot: On a lonely road, a prison transport is brutally assaulted. Martin, the policeman who was driving, survives and fortifies his position while the con men search for a way to finish him.

movies.title: Awake
movies.Plot: After a devastating global event wiped out all electronics and eliminated people's ability to sleep, a former soldier may have found a solution with her daughter.

movies.title: Brightburn
movies.Plot: An alien that looks like a human boy uses its powers in sinister and destructive ways.

movies.title: Night Teeth
movies.Plot: A college student moonlighting as a chauffeur picks up two mysterious women for a night of party-hopping across LA. But when he uncovers their bloodthirsty intentions - and their dangerous, shadowy underworld - he must fight to st...

movies.title: Kidnapping Stella
movies.Plot: Snatched off the street and held for ransom, a bound and gagged woman uses her limited powers to derail her two masked abductors' carefully-laid plans.

movies.title: Dangerous Lies
movies.Plot: When a wealthy elderly man dies and unexpectedly leaves his estate to his new caregiver, she's drawn into a web of deception and murder. If she's going to survive, she'll have to question everyone's motives - even the people she l...

movies.title: Sweet Girl
movies.Plot: A devastated husband vows to bring justice to the people responsible for his wife's death while protecting the only family he has left: his daughter.

movies.title: Lou
movies.Plot: As a storm rages, a young girl is kidnapped. Her mother teams up with the mysterious woman next door to pursue the kidnapper, a journey that tests their limits and exposes shocking secrets from their pasts.

movies.title: Fatal Affair
movies.Plot: Ellie tries to mend her marriage with her husband Marcus after a brief encounter with an old friend, David, only to find that David is more dangerous and unstable than she'd realized.

movies.title: Outside the Wire
movies.Plot: In the near future, a drone pilot sent into a war zone finds himself paired with a top-secret android officer on a mission to stop a nuclear attack.

movies.title: Till Death
movies.Plot: A woman is left handcuffed to her dead husband as part of a sick revenge plot. Unable to unshackle, she has to survive as two killers arrive to finish her off.

movies.title: Don‚Äôt Listen
movies.Plot: Daniel and Sara have a 9-year-old son, Eric, and they've just moved to a new home not knowing the neighbours call it "the house of the voices". Eric is the first one to notice the odd noises behind each door.

movies.title: The Woman in the Window
movies.Plot: An agoraphobic woman living alone in New York begins spying on her new neighbors, only to witness a disturbing act of violence.

movies.title: Until Dawn
movies.Plot: A group of friends trapped in a time loop, where mysterious foes chase and kill them in gruesome ways, must survive until dawn to escape it.

movies.title: Earth and Blood
movies.Plot: Sa√Ød owns a sawmill deep in the woods, which he decides to sell. Little does he know that one of his apprentices was cornered by his brother and forced to hide a large amount of cocaine inside the factory.

movies.title: Against The Ice
movies.Plot: In 1909, two explorers fight to survive after they're left behind while on a Denmark expedition in ice-covered Greenland.

movies.title: A Fall from Grace
movies.Plot: Disheartened since her ex-husband's affair, Grace Waters feels restored by a new romance. But when secrets erode her short-lived joy, Grace's vulnerable side turns violent.

April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

movies.title: Munich ‚Äì The Edge of War
movies.Plot: A British diplomat travels to Munich in the run-up to World War II, where a former classmate of his from Oxford is also en route, but is working for the German government.

movies.title: Rebel Ridge
movies.Plot: A former Marine grapples his way through a web of small-town corruption when an attempt to post bail for his cousin escalates into a violent standoff with the local police chief.

movies.title: The Gray Man
movies.Plot: When the CIA's most skilled operative, whose true identity is known to none, accidentally uncovers dark agency secrets, a psychopathic former colleague puts a bounty on his head, setting off a global manhunt by international assas...

movies.title: Vanished into the Night
movies.Plot: A father, immersed in a difficult divorce process, embarks on a dangerous mission when his children disappear from their isolated country house.

movies.title: The Forgotten Battle
movies.Plot: In WWII's final years, a soldier in the German army, a British glider pilot, and a Dutch resistance fighter's paths intertwine. Their choices shape destinies, impacting not only their freedom but also that of others.

movies.title: Don't Let Go
movies.Plot: Detective Jack Radcliff and his recently murdered niece race against time to solve the crime before it happens.

movies.title: The Fanatic
movies.Plot: A rabid film fan stalks his favorite action hero and destroys his life.

movies.title: Silverton Siege
movies.Plot: Follows three young freedom fighters who seek refuge in a South African bank in Silverton, and take the bank and its customers hostage and would only release them in exchange for the release of Nelson Mandela.

movies.title: Disappear Completely
movies.Plot: After visiting a crime scene, an ambitious and insensitive tabloid crime photographer, falls victim to a mysterious illness that makes him lose, one by one, his five senses.

movies.title: Army of Thieves
movies.Plot: A prequel, set before the events of Army of the Dead, which focuses on German safecracker Ludwig Dieter leading a group of aspiring thieves on a top secret heist during the early stages of the zombie apocalypse.

movies.title: Loving Adults
movies.Plot: The thin line between love and hate turns deadly when a wife discovers her husband's affair - and they both take extreme measures to get what they want.

movies.title: Under Paris
movies.Plot: To save Paris from a bloodbath, a grieving scientist is forced to face her tragic past when a giant shark appears in the Seine.

movies.title: Murder Mystery 2
movies.Plot: Full-time detectives Nick and Audrey are struggling to get their private eye agency off the ground. They find themselves at the center of international abduction when their friend Maharaja is kidnapped at his own lavish wedding.

movies.title: Old People
movies.Plot: A woman travels home with her two kids for her sister's wedding but finds herself defending her family against blood-seeking pensioners.

movies.title: The Plagues of Breslau
movies.Plot: Every day at 6 pm a serial killer kills a different person. Police officer Helena Rus decides to find the killer by researching about 18th century history of the city.

movies.title: The Woman in Cabin 10
movies.Plot: A travel writer stumbles upon a gruesome secret while traveling aboard a luxury cruise ship.

movies.title: Hypnotic
movies.Plot: A young woman seeking self-improvement enlists the help of a renowned hypnotherapist. But after a handful of intense sessions, she discovers unexpected and deadly consequences.

movies.title: End of the Road
movies.Plot: In this high-octane action thriller, a cross-country road trip becomes a highway to hell for Brenda and her family. Alone in the New Mexico desert, they have to fight for their lives when they become the targets of a mysterious ki...

movies.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2
movies.Plot: When strangers Reet and Ruhan cross paths, their journey leads to an abandoned mansion and a dreaded spirit that has been trapped for 18 years.

movies.title: Troll
movies.Plot: Deep in the Dovre mountain, something gigantic wakes up after a thousand years in captivity. The creature destroys everything in its path and quickly approaches Oslo.

movies.title: The Binding
movies.Plot: While visiting her fianc√©'s mother in southern Italy, a woman must fight the mysterious and malevolent curse intent on claiming her daughter.

movies.title: Ferry
movies.Plot: Ruthless Ferry Bouman is sent to his native region of Brabant by his boss Brink to avenge an attack on their gang. When he meets lovely Danielle and old family feuds resurface, Brabant starts to pierce his steel armour.

movies.title: JJ+E
movies.Plot: Two youngsters are raised in the same city, yet they live light years apart, separated economically, socially and culturally. That is until the day they start in the same high school class.

movies.title: Khufiya
movies.Plot: Krishna Mehra is an operative at Indian spy agency known as R&AW. She is assigned to track down the mole selling India's defense secrets, while all along grappling with her dual identity as a spy and a lover.

movies.title: Recurrence
movies.Plot: Helen has fled to Sweden with her daughter and is struggling with making ends meet. One day Isaak visits and claims to be working for the resistance in her home country and brings news of her sister. But can he be trusted?

movies.title: The Good Nurse
movies.Plot: An infamous caregiver is implicated in the deaths of hundreds of hospital patients.

movies.title: Bartkowiak
movies.Plot: After his brother dies in a car crash, a disgraced MMA fighter takes over the family nightclub and soon learns his sibling's death wasn't an accident.

movies.title: Roohi
movies.Plot: Hired to kidnap a bride, two bumbling pals get into a wacky predicament when one falls for their abductee, and the other falls for the spirit that possesses her.

movies.title: Oxygen
movies.Plot: A woman wakes in a cryogenic chamber with no recollection of how she got there. As she's running out of oxygen, she must rebuild her memory to find a way out of her nightmare.

movies.title: Enola Holmes
movies.Plot: When Enola Holmes, Sherlock's sister, discovers her mother is missing, she endeavors to find her, becoming a super-sleuth in her own right as she outwits her famous brother and unravels a dangerous conspiracy.

movies.title: Luther: The Fallen Sun
movies.Plot: Brilliant but disgraced detective John Luther breaks out of prison to hunt down a sadistic serial killer who is terrorising London.

movies.title: The Whole Truth
movies.Plot: When two siblings stumble on a strange hole in the wall of their grandparents' house, horrifying incidents reveal sinister secrets about their family.

movies.title: The Weekend Away
movies.Plot: A weekend getaway to Croatia goes awry after a woman is accused of killing her best friend. As she attempts to clear her name and uncover the truth, her efforts unearth a painful secret.

movies.title: Little Siberia
movies.Plot: A pastor's faith turns upside down when a meteorite lands in his small Finnish town, its impact stirring up chaos and criminal intentions.

movies.title: Forever Rich
movies.Plot: When Richie's watch is stolen in a violent robbery and humiliating images of the encounter go viral, the rapper has to fix his reputation to save his career.

movies.title: Chor Nikal Ke Bhaga
movies.Plot: A flight attendant and her business partner on a mission to steal diamonds and free themselves from the clutches of a loan shark.At 40,000 feet in the air, the heist goes horribly wrong and turns into a hostage situation.

movies.title: Leave the World Behind
movies.Plot: A family's getaway to a luxurious rental home takes an ominous turn when a cyberattack knocks out their devices, and two strangers appear at their door.

movies.title: The Old Guard 2
movies.Plot: Andy leads immortal warriors against a powerful enemy threatening their group. They grapple with the resurfacing of a long-lost immortal, complicating their mission to safeguard humanity.

movies.title: In for a Murder
